trying to ignore the string:

    "\11\5\1\1\1\3\2\0\1\40\16\5\4\0\1\1\1\0\1\24"

The result is:

    "\t" //$NON-NLS-1$

OOPS!
(The code is some code generated by www.antlr.org)

Need to investigate whether this is caused by new support for Eclipse-based
NLSing approach.

I have the problem for the attached file and I can still reproduce it with M6:
- quick fix "externalize strings"
- select all items in the table
- Ignore
- on the diff page you can see the problen...

The strings contain octal escapes which are shown as when they shown an UI. I
guess, you would like to see the uninterpreted string. The strings are not
modified, are they i.e. is the file being changed?
